Text:
Thanks... liked this one, but do you know of anyone that has a "special" version that was only aired to the public 1 time? 
It's different from the "limited screener" & "theatrical release" versions... and a description of what I'm talking about is on wikipedia.
Any help on getting that version is greatly appreciated!!

@ZenRhino:

You'll want this torrent:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5233929/Paranormal_Activity_ALTERNATE_CUT_DVDRip_XviD-NODLABS%28No_Rars%29

It's got the cut that was only aired once.
Finally, someone has the common sense to say which version this is.  There are three out there you know.  Thank you, Vicerock.
